org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp

Class ParameterNodeImp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.NodeImp
      • org.trianacode.taskgraph.imp.ParameterNodeImp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NodeListener, Node, ParameterNode
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ErrorNode, RunnableParameterNode, TriggerNode

    public class ParameterNodeImp
extends NodeImp
implements ParameterNode
    An implementation of the parameter node interface, that extends NodeImp

      • isEssentialIfConnected

        Overrides:

      • isOptional

        public boolean isOptional()
        Specified by:
        isOptional in interface Node
        Overrides:
        isOptional in class NodeImp
        Returns:
        true if data is not required at this node for the task to run. Note that parameter nodes are optional by default.
